TopicTitle: The Unofficial Kerbal Space Program Forum Steam Group

Articles.Content:

Uhm... And which one are you using at the moment? Can you send me a link?
supraman2jzgte

supraman2jzgte

Oh sorry, didn't see that one. I can't find you however, is it possible that you posted your account name? You shouldn't post that one online, other people can't find you over that.

Oh and by the way, you all miss a lot when you don't join the group, just saying.

For example, today we discussed what an exclamation mark is and what not.

Edited February 2, 2015 by Volcanix

Hello there!

Since there weren't any new posts lately, I decided I should post something in order to prevent the thread from dying. I hope this isn't considered necro-posting.

We got a new group picture today and I thought it was worth sharing, if someone is interested in joining simply send me a friend request on Steam (my name there is Volcanix). See ya
My name on steam is Mr. Picard! I wouldn't mind chatting. I play KSP, Star Trek Online, and Space Engineers primarily.

My name on steam is Mr. Picard! I wouldn't mind chatting. I play KSP, Star Trek Online, and Space Engineers primarily.

Got you Welcome.

Volcanix said:

Since there weren't any new posts lately, I decided I should post something in order to prevent the thread from dying. I hope this isn't considered necro-posting.

Most awesome steam group ever?

 

Edited March 5, 2020 by Hydrazine_Soup

Isn't this the most awesome steam group ever?

With the official KSP group I think there isn't even another steam group for KSP, But I'm not sure about it.

On 2/1/2015 at 9:25 AM, Volcanix said:

Oh sorry, didn't see that one. I can't find you however, is it possible that you posted your account name? You shouldn't post that one online, other people can't find you over that.

Oh and by the way, you all miss a lot when you don't join the group, just saying.

For example, today we discussed what an exclamation mark is and what not.

Wow sorry I never seen this, at the time I was super new to Steam. you wanna look up My2jzget  

pic is a white car.

My steam name is DolphinDude3, I mostly play KSP (Which I've added to Steam as a non-steam game since I purchased it directly from SQUAD), SpaceEngine (Also a non-steam game that I've added), Space Engineers, and WarThunder. And I'm willing to join the Steam group!
Not sure if I'm already in the group or not, but I'm also Just Jim on steam

Account name: Halls_of_Mandos1 (from Tolkien mythology)

https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198204707347/

would be awesome to talk about KSP!

Four years and four days have passed since this group has been opened by  @Volcanix but the group is still up and running, even after the dreadful Steam user interface update.

Here's an invitation link.

Most of the time there's someone online. Ask any questions regarding KSP as most people who frequent the group are KSP veterans and will gladly help you.

Warning: There's a few old guys on there who like to demotivate people to the point of crying

/jk    I live there and it's fun.

Edited September 4, 2018 by ZedNova

28 minutes ago, ZedNova said:

Warning: There's a few old guys on there who like to demotivate people to the point of crying.

And a few younger guys like Zed here. And there's also me.

2 hours ago, ZedNova said:

Warning: There's a few old guys on there who like to demotivate people to the point of crying.

Then report the threads. The moderation team cannot intervene unless you do.

[Quoted a post that has since been removed]

Why should I open a new thread with same topic, just to advertise 4 years of the same group with almost same words? Necroposting is not a breach of rules if it's meaningful.

 

9 hours ago, adsii1970 said:

Then report the threads. The moderation team cannot intervene unless you do.

ZedNova is a member of the group who doesn't want new people to come and made a joke that looks serious. He obviously didn't think it through well enough to realize how inconvenient such careless claim would be. The group is fine, nobody has ever been harassed. 

Edited September 4, 2018 by Deddly

Just posting to confirm that "necroposting" is not against the rules if the topic is still valid. "Necromoaning", however is against the rules (2.4b) so please don't do that. Necromoaning has been removed from this thread.

Yes, it's great in there!

Whoever wants to join is welcome to do so. Lajos posted an invitation link a couple posts above!

Edited February 18, 2020 by Hydrazine_Soup
